CONDITIONAL FORMATING
PROJECT
S.NO WORKSHEET RULE TYPE DESCRIPTION
1 product1 cell value
find specific numbers, dates, and
text in a list of products
2 product2 cell value with (formula) see a dynamically changed number or
text value in a list of products
3 book tour top/bottom values
above/below average
 identify top/bottom and above
average values in a recent book tour
report
4 grades top/bottom values determine who are the top 2 students
in the class
5 customer1 unique duplicates find duplicates rows in a list of
customers
6 Quarters icon sets
7 bike rating icon sets compare different product criteria by
using a rating scale
8 F.Y months icon sets examine profit trends from month to
month
9 regional scales icon sets identify regional sales below $9000000
10 data bars compare heights of the tallests
mountains
11 category sales 3 color scale examine overall sales distributions in
key product categories
